name: David F. GOULD, III, Petitioner v. The ZONING HEARING BOARD OF BRISTOL BOROUGH, Respondent. Bristol Borough, Intervenor

parties: David F. GOULD, III, Petitioner v. The ZONING HEARING BOARD OF BRISTOL BOROUGH, Respondent. Bristol Borough, Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 9th day of July, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and the Petition for Permission to File Post-Submission Communication are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
47 A.3d 1179
David F. GOULD, III, Petitioner v. The ZONING HEARING BOARD OF BRISTOL BOROUGH, Respondent. Bristol Borough, Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 9, 2012.
